statements: UPDATE performance_reports SET metrics = '{"sales": 150, "expenses": 100}' WHERE report_id = '68f54e76-6b19-4df7-82ac-fb1eb8e17ff7';
UPDATE performance_reports SET outcomes = '{"profit": 50, "revenue": 200}' WHERE supplier_id = '4ced5040-d55a-4927-a60b-34f8db89099c';
UPDATE performance_reports SET outcomes = '{"revenue": 50000, "profit": 20000}' WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE performance_reports SET metrics = '{"conversion_rate": 0.05}' WHERE supplier_id = '11223344-5566-7788-99aa-bbccddeeff00'
UPDATE supplier_performance_reports SET total_sales = 5000.00, total_expenses = 3000.00 WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND report_date = '2022-06-15';
UPDATE supplier_dashboards SET performance_rating = 4, issues_found = 'None' WHERE supplier_id = 201 AND dashboard_date = '2022-07-01';
UPDATE supplier_performance_reports SET total_sales = 50000, total_expenses = 20000 WHERE supplier_id = 123 AND report_date = '2022-01-31';
UPDATE supplier_dashboards SET performance_rating = 4, issues_found = 'Quality concerns identified' WHERE supplier_id = 456 AND dashboard_date = '2022-02-28';
UPDATE supplier_performance SET total_revenue = 1500.75, total_orders = 20 WHERE supplier_id = 100
UPDATE order_details SET order_amount = 500.50, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE order_id = 2000
UPDATE supplier_performance SET total_orders = total_orders + 1, total_revenue = total_revenue * 1.05 WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET revenue = revenue + 10000.50, orders_count = orders_count + 10 WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND year = 2022 AND month = 6;
UPDATE supplier_performance_metrics SET delivery_performance = 4.5, rating = 3.8 WHERE supplier_id = 101;
UPDATE order_details SET order_status = 'DELIVERED', delivery_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE supplier_performance_metrics SET order_count = 50, delivery_performance = 0.95 WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE order_details SET order_status = 'Delivered' WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE supplier_performance_reports SET delivery_performance = 4.5, quality_performance = 3.8 WHERE supplier_id = 123;
UPDATE key_metrics_tracking SET tracking_value = 150.7 WHERE tracking_id = 456;
UPDATE supplier_performance_reports SET delivery_performance = 8.5, quality_performance = 9.3 WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND report_date = '2022-08-15';
UPDATE key_metrics_tracking SET tracking_value = 145.7, tracking_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE metric_id = 201 AND tracking_id = 301;
